named-query.name: Brouwer.findAll
named-query.query: select br from Brouwer br order by naam

named-query.name: Brouwer.readBrouwerAndBier
named-query.query: select br from Brouwer br join fetch br.bieren where br.brouwerNr like :id

named-query.name: Bier.readBierSoortAndBrouwer
named-query.query: select b from Bier b join fetch b.soort join fetch b.brouwer where b.bierNr like :id
